definition: to awaken/to come to realize/awakened to the truth/the truth dawns upon one/scales fall from the eyes/to become aware
to wake up/to be awake/to become aware/to sober up/to come to
to wake up from a sleep

sentences.english: The unawakened one whether does or does not do, does try.
sentences.chinese: 未觉醒的人无论行动与否，都在努力尝试让事情发生。

sentences.english: Already the press of arousal , can not achieve symbolistic earnings only readily.
sentences.chinese: 已经觉醒的出版社，并不甘心只能获得象征性的收益。

sentences.english: This emerging awakening is a blessing from Source of All.
sentences.chinese: 这一浮现的觉醒是万有之源的一份祝福。

sentences.english: I often wake up with a new idea.
sentences.chinese: 一觉醒来就会想到一个新点子。

sentences.english: Many of your awakened experts have referred to this as the weaponisation of space.
sentences.chinese: 你们很多觉醒的专家已经提到了这些空间武器。

sentences.english: By his own account, Mr. Obama experienced a political awakening at Occidental.
sentences.chinese: 按奥巴马自己的说法，他在西方学院经历了政治觉醒。

sentences.english: With such a view your Awakening practice Will be strong and firm-minded.
sentences.chinese: 生此正见觉醒修持将变得坚强心稳固。

sentences.english: The rapid development of the information industry has revoked the economical value of the factual information.
sentences.chinese: 信息产业迅猛发展催发了事实信息经济价值的觉醒。

sentences.english: The studies of Foucault and New Historicism have aroused people's awareness of the discourse of power.
sentences.chinese: 福柯和新历史主义批评唤起了人们对权力话语的觉醒。

sentences.english: I was averaging 42 arousals per hour.
sentences.chinese: 我每小时平均的觉醒次数是42次。

sentences.english: Liberation and awakened understanding can’t be found by devoting ourselves to the study of the Buddhist scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 解脱和觉醒无法从钻研佛经中获得。

sentences.english: There will be great relief from worry. This will happen as a result of an increase in heart awareness.
sentences.chinese: 焦虑的情绪首先会被释放掉，心识也将有更深的觉醒。
不觉醒的人必须练习谦卑。

sentences.english: It awaits this long destined awakening, from within the sacred Ark.
sentences.chinese: 它期待着这长久以来的觉醒，神圣的方舟就在它里面。

sentences.english: It dismays me to say that very few of the People are awakening.
sentences.chinese: 令我失望地说，极少的人觉醒了。

definition: to come to/to awaken/to regain consciousness
this life/to lose face/to be disgraced
to be fast asleep/(fig.) to lie dormant/to lie undiscovered
(of insects) to undergo metamorphosis/(fig.) to be transformed/to metamorphose/to become degraded
to revive/(lit. and fig.) to come back to life/(religion) resurrection
